name: 3D Cupcake Girly Girl Bakery Run Game FREE
name_original: 3D Cupcake Girly Girl Bakery Run Game FREE
description:
It's the Ultimate Cupcake Bakery Challenge!!!
*******************************************************************************************
Do you have what it takes to be the World's Best Cupcake???
*******************************************************************************************

Choose your favorite cupcake and race through this amazing bakery to save the day!!! You will love the super sweet characters, amazing graphics, ultra-challenging obstacles and exciting game play!

GAME FEATURES:
-4 Cute Cupcakes to Choose From
-Collect Coins and Power-ups
-Complete tasks to win extra coins
-Become the best cupcake ever!!!

Download today and play!!!
